title: I want to create a NEW address book named "Ministry" in Thunderbird 128 - is this possible?
content:
I see THREE address book entries in Thunderbird 128. All Address Books Personal Address Book -my gmail account- Collected Addresses

It is POSSIBLE to create other address books? I WANT one named "Ministry" for specific activity contacts! Is Thunderbird NOT designed to handle this??? I can see that one might want a number of function/activity-specific books to deal with separately.
creator: phubert28

title: Fresh install
content: How to do a fresh install without knowing my primary password or do I delete everything and start from scratch.
creator: debandmikeb

title: Setting up email account
content: I successfully set up an icloud email account in Thunderbird on a laptop but cannot get it set up on a desktop. I am attempting to use the previously generated app-specific password. I think I remember that on the laptop I could not key the password, but had to copy and paste. If I generate another app-specific password, will it invalidate the password presently working on the laptop? Or am I missing something else?
creator: bob_pierce

title: Font only changed via "Other Writing Systems", not on a per-script basis
content:
I received some Arabic-language emails written in the Perso–Arabic script. The default fonts severely impede Arabic readability, so I went about changing them. I accessed the fonts configuration via the "Advanced" button in the "Language & Appearance" section. Font settings per writing system (Latin, Arabic, etc.) are ostensibly offered, but I have not observed any such settings take effect after experimenting with the Arabic and Latin settings.

I have managed to only change the fonts globally (i.e. across all scripts) via "Other Writing Systems". Did those per-script font settings become deprecated at some point, or am I interpreting/using it wrong?
creator: anonymous-vR3wO

title: How to transfer TBird archives from IMAP server to a local disk
content: I have a large amount of email stored on an IMAP server. Would like to reduce that by moving most or all of it to a local disk drive. Am looking for a (hopefully simple) guide to doing the transfer. I don't see a Local Folders entry in the left-hand pane; not sure if that matters. (Presently running TB 115.10.1 64-bit on Windows 10 and 11.)
creator: ronks1

title: How to avoid dark mode ?
content:
I love Thunderbird. It is fast, robust and efficient. But now, every time I launch the app, it is in dark mode and it is difficult for me to use it because of my terrible eyes. How can I turn off dark mode ?

I use Thunderbird on Fedora 41 Gnome. Thanks in advance for your help.
creator: kidcreole38

title: Inoltro inviti Google Calendar tramite Thunderbird
content: Buongiorno, ho installato da poco Thunderbird su 2 PC Windws e utilizzo il calendario di Google in lettura/scrittura, funziona tutto perfettamente l'unica cosa che non riesco a risolvere è la modalità di inoltro degli inviti ai partecipanti ad un evento, in pratica l'invito viene inviato 2 volte, la prima come utente Gmail(che non vorrei venisse utilizzata) la seconda con la mail del client(che vorrei venisse utilizzata). Nell'impostazione del calendario in Thunderbird è selezionata l'opzione "preferire la pianificazione delle mail su client". Come posso risolvere il doppio invio di mail preferendo quella del client a quella di Gmail? Grazie.
creator: vanni.tincani

content:

Any way to get to the mirrored account?

Thanks, Sue

content:

The folders are empty, now that they are mapped, is there a final step required to import all their contents?

title: Toegevoegde hotmailaccount die op zich perfect werkt verdwijnt weer telkens als ik Thunderbird afsluit en heropstart
content: Ik maakte een hotmailadres aan en voegde dat account toe (met de nieuwe Microsoft autentificatie) Het werkt perfect : ik krijg mijn mailbox en kan verzenden en ontvangen. Telkens ik echter Thunderbird echter afsluit en terug open is die account terug verdwenen en moet ik die opnieuw koppelen......
creator: hvo254

title: Accessing the address book programmatically?
content:
Hi,

I would like to integrate the user's address book (or more specifically the contact details of the current user) into my own (c++) desktop (Windows/MacOS/Linux) application for the user's convenience.

Is this possible at all? If so, where can I start reading to find out how to do this?

(If it's not possible through an API, is the address book file format documented somewhere, so I can read it directly?)

I don't need write access. I just need to be able to read the user's contacts.

Cheers, James
creator: crazydef

title: metamask fa crashare il browser firefox quando lo cerco di installare
content: metamask fa crashare il browser firefox quando lo cerco di installare, provato piu volte, crasha esattamente quando compilo la parte sullo screenshot allegato e vado avanti
creator: davidefrng

title: Option to ask the user to save or discard messages after sending an email
content:
Hello! Seriously considering Thunderbird after the recent refresh and am super delighted to see your collective contributions. A big thanks at the outset! I handle about 100 emails a day (both in and outbound) and have to keep going to the sent box towards the close of the day to delete all emails which i had to respond to but have no future use for. Could you introduce a feature in Thunderbird where the user is asked whether he/she wishes to save the email just after sending it? A "yes" retains the email in the sent box while a "no" does not. That way, i dont have to go to my sent box and go through numerous emails at the end of the day to keep my mailboxes clean.

Secondly, could you introduce the ability to compose signatures within the application itself please?

Just wanted to leave these two thoughts here. Wishing you the best for many more iterations of a truly wonderful outlook alternative!
creator: anvarlaksh

title: Sähköpostitili kaatuilee!?
content:
Hei! Minulla on isoja ongelmia MozillaThunderin kanssa. Olen käyttänyt ohjelmaa kohta 20 vuotta ja kaikki on mennyt hyvin. Mutta nyt on kaksi viikkoa mennyt pieleen.. Minulla on kolme postilokeroa käytössä harri.hautala@hetemark.fi kalajoenrealisointi@hetemark.fi tilitoimisto@hetemark.fi

Näistä pääpostini harri.hautala tökkii... Se menee niinku jumiin ja monta kertaa päivän aikana. Ensin tulee teksti huomautus, että yhteysttä ei saada ja kun odottelee, kohta kaikki lokeron postit on kadoksissa ja ne alkaa lataantumaan uudelleen. Erittäin ikävää ja haastavaa, kun pitäisi kirjoittaa viestejä tai vastailla, kun se menee niin hitaaksi. Kännykällä ja tabletilla toimii normaalisti. Olen käyttöliittymän asentanut kolmeen tietokoneeseen ja kolmeen kännykkään/tablettiin. Näissä mobililaitteissa ei ole ongelmaa(android) Osaatteko auttaa, miksi tämä uudelleen latasu aina vaan alkaa uudelleen? TÄmä ongelma on siis vain yhdessä postissa. ASensimme sen uudelleenkin, ei auttanut... Mielestäni tämä ongelma alkoi, kun tuli uusin päivitys.

Olisin kiitollinen neuvoista! tv. Harri Hautala
creator: harri.hautala
